description:
Gone are the days of backpacks overloaded with binders and the chronic hand-cramps from trying to write as fast as possible. Nowadays, a good laptop elevates your productivity and allows you to keep all your important lesson materials in one place. Whether you’re new to campus or heading into your final year, having a laptop that’s capable, sturdy, and portable — with good battery life, natch — will help keep you on top of your studies, or gaming (no judgement).

Why you should trust us: It’s in our name, PCWorld. We’ve been reviewing laptops for decades, with exacting standards applied to all facets of the user experience, from performance benchmarks to features to the rigors of daily use. Our experts know their stuff and have curated a comprehensive list of the best laptops for college stud
title: Best laptops for college students 2024: Top picks and expert advice

description:
Everyone is all about convenience in today’s fast-paced world. So don’t settle for having to plug in to charge your phone. With the Speedy Mag Wireless Charger for iPhone, you can get a charge anywhere completely wirelessly.

Made for iPhone 12 and newer, the Speedy Mag is a sleek, pocket-sized charger that uses magnetic absorption to create a strong connection to your phone. That keeps it from sliding off, while built-in safeguards like Fast Mag Wireless protect your phone from overcharging. It’s MagSafe- and Qi-compa
title: Get a wireless iPhone charger for $80 off

description:
If you’re an Apple Watch wearer, you know how frustrating it is to stop during your day to charge your Apple Watch. But with PowerBand, you don’t have to. This innovative Apple Watch band has an integrated MagSafe charger and during our President’s Day Sale, you can get it for 20% off.

Compatible with all Apple Watch series, the highly adjustable band is crafted from a breathable nylon weave, so it fits everyone with easy adj
title: Save $10 on this Apple Watch Band with a built-in charger
